servinfo.title: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like popcorn popping
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the following when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:J24B and Engine Basic Inspection:J24B .

condition.ptxt: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like popcorn popping

ps.ptxt: Clogged fuel filter (faulty fuel pump) or fuel lines

action.ptxt: Fuel Pressure Basic Check:J24B or Fuel Pump and Its Circuit Check:J24B

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold or throttle body gasket
Poor performance of knock sensor, ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Knock Sensor Inspection:J24B , ECT (Engine Coolant Temperature) Sensor Inspection:J24B or MAF & IAT Sensor Inspection:J24B

ptxt.intxref: Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits:J24B

action.ptxt: Cylinder Head Inspection:J24B and Cylinder, Piston and Piston Ring Inspection:J24B

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe
Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order
